SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface ICampStudentService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampStudentService
public interface ICampStudentService
The ICampStudentService interface defines methods for retrieving information about camps and managing a student's participation in camps.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Camp>
    getAllCamps()
    Retrieves a list of available camps that a student can register for.
    List<Camp>
    getAvailableCampsToRegister()
    Retrieves a list of available camps that a student can register for.
    Camp
    getCampCommitteeCamp(Student student)
    Return camp for which the student is currently registered as a Committee Member.
    List<Camp>
    getRegisteredCamps()
    Retrieves a list of camps for which the student is currently registered.
    List<Camp>
    getWithdrawnCamps()
    Retrieves a list of camps from which the student has withdrawn.
    boolean
    registerAsCommittee(Student student, Camp camp)
    Registers the student as a Committee Member for a specific camp.
    boolean
    registerCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
    Registers the student for a specific camp.
    boolean
    withdrawCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
    Withdraws the student from a specific camp.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableCampsToRegister

      List<Camp> getAvailableCampsToRegister()
      Retrieves a list of available camps that a student can register for.
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the available camps

    • getAllCamps

      List<Camp> getAllCamps()
      Retrieves a list of available camps that a student can register for.
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the available camps

    • getWithdrawnCamps

      List<Camp> getWithdrawnCamps()
      Retrieves a list of camps from which the student has withdrawn.
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the withdrawn camps

    • getRegisteredCamps

      List<Camp> getRegisteredCamps()
      Retrieves a list of camps for which the student is currently registered.
      Returns:
      a List of Camp objects representing the registered camps

    • getCampCommitteeCamp

      Camp getCampCommitteeCamp(Student student)
      Return camp for which the student is currently registered as a Committee Member.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to find the camp they are registered as a committee member.
      Returns:
      a Camp representing the camp registered by Committee Member.

    • registerCamp

      boolean registerCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Registers the student for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to register
      camp - the Camp to register for
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful, false otherwise

    • withdrawCamp

      boolean withdrawCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Withdraws the student from a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to withdraw
      camp - the Camp to withdraw from
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal is successful, false otherwise

    • registerAsCommittee

      boolean registerAsCommittee(Student student, Camp camp)
      Registers the student as a Committee Member for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to register as a Committee Member
      camp - the Camp for which to register as a Committee Member
      Returns:
      true if registration as a Committee Member is successful, false otherwise
